aiVolumeRate.Wiki: Multiplies AI sound produced when in contact with this material

spEffectIdOnHit0.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game

spEffectIdOnHit1.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game

floorHeightType.Wiki: For floating items such as on the water surface

disableFallDamage.Wiki: When enabled player and Npc's will not take fall damage when falling onto this material

hardnessType.Wiki: Hardness of the material. Used for soft contact processing of rigid bodies

wetTiming.Wiki: Controls whether the whole body gets wet when stepping on the floor material, or whether it gets wet if specified by TAE

spEffectId_forWet.Wiki: SpEffect applied when this makes you wet

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_2.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_3.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 2

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_4.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 3

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_5.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 4

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_6.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 5

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_7.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 6

spEffectIdOnHit0_ClearCount_8.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 7

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_2.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 1

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_3.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 2

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_4.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 3

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_5.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 4

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_6.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 5

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_7.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 6

spEffectIdOnHit1_ClearCount_8.Wiki: Applies speffect to player when they touch this material in New Game Plus 7

fallDeathDist.Wiki: When you land on this hit material, if you are falling from a height higher than the set value, you will die instantly upon landing. Valid only for PC

fallDamageRate.Wiki: When you land on this hit material, this multiplier is applied to the fall damage. Valid only for PC
